Configure which page should be displayed: Configure which page should be displayed as your site's homepage.
Configure automatic import and updates o: Configure automatic import and updates of artist metadata and biographies.
This will automatically import, and peri: This will automatically import, and periodically update, all metadata available on spotify about the artist when user visits that artist's page.
Configure automatic import and updates o: Configure automatic import and updates of album metadata.
This will automatically import, and peri: This will automatically import, and periodically update, all metadata available on spotify about an album when user visits that album's page.
Configure which method should be used fo: Configure which method should be used for user facing search in the web player.
Search on the site will directly connect: Search on the site will directly connect to, and search spotify. Any artist, album and track available on spotify will be discoverable via search, without needing to import or create it first.
Will only search content that was create: Will only search content that was created or imported from backstage or admin area. This can be further configured from 'Local search' settings page.
Will combine search results from both 'l: Will combine search results from both 'local' and 'spotify' methods. If there are identical matches, local results will be preferred.
Configure automatic lyrics import for tr: Configure automatic lyrics import for tracks.
Try to automatically find and import lyr: Try to automatically find and import lyrics based on song and artist name. Lyrics can still be added manually, if this is disabled.
Will import artist biography from wikipe: Will import artist biography from wikipedia in the selected language.
Will only show artist biography that was: Will only show artist biography that was manually added from admin area or backstage.
Configure API credentials for external s: Configure API credentials for external services used by automation features.
This will also import all artists that c: This will also import all artists that collaborated on this track and album this track belongs to.

Title: Title
Select which tabs should appear on artis: Select which tabs should appear on artist page and in which order.
How should albums on main artist page be: How should albums on main artist page be displayed by default.
Whether short artist biography be shown: Whether short artist biography be shown in main artist page header.
Show all artist tracks in a list view.
Show all artist albums in a list view.
Shows all users that are currently follo: Shows all users that are currently following an artist.
Shows artist biography/description as we: Shows artist biography/description as well as extra images
Shows all artist albums in grid or list: Shows all artist albums in grid or list view.
When content is sorted by popularity (e.g. in track tables), choose whether to use Spotify popularity or local play counts.
Configure default audio volume and playb: Configure default audio volume and playback settings.
Set the default volume level (1-100) whe: Set the default volume level (1-100) when the player loads.
Choose between waveform visualization or: Choose between waveform visualization or simple line seekbar. Waveforms are generated during upload and will default to simple for auto-imported tracks.
Enable or disable social interaction fea: Enable or disable social interaction features for tracks and albums.
Allow users to repost albums and tracks: Allow users to repost albums and tracks to share them with their followers.
Allow users to leave comments on albums: Allow users to leave comments on albums and tracks.
Control whether users can make music ava: Control whether users can make music available for offline listening. Does not work for tracks with youtube as the only playback source.
Control which navigation elements and ac: Control which navigation elements and access points are visible to users.
Show upload button in the left sidebar f: Show upload button in the left sidebar for users with upload permissions.
Show 'Become artist' menu item for users: Show 'Become artist' menu item for users who are not yet artists.
Configure how uploaded content is proces: Configure how uploaded content is processed and matched with existing data.
Automatically match uploaded files with: Automatically match uploaded files with existing albums and artists based on metadata, or create new entries if they don't exist.
Hide the lyrics button from player contr: Hide the lyrics button from player controls.
Hide the player queue sidebar by default: Hide the player queue sidebar by default. Users can still toggle it using the queue button.
Hide 'Go to radio' buttons throughout th: Hide 'Go to radio' buttons throughout the application.
Show download button in player controls. Only appears if track has an audio or video file uploaded.
Configure video player visibility and co: Configure video player visibility and control buttons.
Hide toggle fullscreen button from playe: Hide toggle fullscreen button from player controls.
Hide the small video player in the botto: Hide the small video player in the bottom right corner by default. Note: This may cause background playback issues with YouTube embeds, especially on mobile.
Configure mobile-specific player behavio: Configure mobile-specific player behavior and experience.
Automatically open fullscreen video over: Automatically open fullscreen video overlay on mobile when playback starts. Only applies to YouTube streaming.

Supports audio, video, hls/dash stream a: Supports audio, video, hls/dash stream and youtube video url. If left empty, best matching youtube video will be found automatically.
